Module org.apache.arrow.vector
Package org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc

Class ArrowFileWriter

java.lang.Object
org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.ArrowWriter
org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.ArrowFileWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class ArrowFileWriter extends ArrowWriter
ArrowWriter that writes out a Arrow files (https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/IPC.html#file-format).

    ensureDictionariesWritten(DictionaryProvider provider, Set<Long> dictionaryIdsUsed)
